DOC.brief_summary: Female pelvic floor dysfunction ( FPD ) due defect pelvic support structure , degradation , damage dysfunction . The main problem pelvic organ prolapse ( POP ) , urinary incontinence ( UI ) genital tract injury . Although pose serious threat life , affect patient 's quality life seriously physical , psychological , social behavior aspect . With grow age population , incidence rate gradually increase , increase demand people 's quality life simultaneously , attention raise PFD common chronic disease . In recent year , basic research , epidemiology , prevention , diagnosis treatment PFD make great progress , especially develop gynecological urology theory reconstructive pelvic surgery . But overall basic research PFD lag behind , especially susceptibility gene localization functional study get enough attention .
DOC.brief_title: The Study Genes Localization Female Pelvic Floor Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: 1. female age 30 70year old ; 2. preoperative diagnosis gynecologic malignancy ; 3. ability comply Research program ; 4. voluntarily participate study sign informed consent form 1. patient severe cardiovascular disease , kidney , liver vital organ disease , bone marrow disease mental illness ; 2. patient suffer autoimmune disease ; 3. patient acute infectious disease infection early phase infection ; 4. patient urinary tract infection ; 5. patient infection erosion anogenital skin ; 6. reason , researcher consider unsuitable inclusion .
